# GitHub Copilot Instructions

This file is the entry point for GitHub Copilot agents working on this project.

Before starting any task, read in order:

1. `developmentGuide.md` - All development principles, coding standards, workflow, and architecture
2. `memory-bank/activeContext.md` - Current work state and recent changes
3. `memory-bank/systemPatterns.md` - Architecture decisions (when relevant)

At session end, propose updates to `memory-bank/activeContext.md` and `memory-bank/progress.md`.
